item.title: Central Park Hits Its Hottest Temperature Since 2012
item.description: New York’s official temperature gauge hit 99 degrees on Tuesday afternoon. It could climb even higher.

item.title: Trump’s Iran Diplomacy Failed. I Hope His Airstrike Succeeds.
item.description: Iran can’t be allowed to develop a nuclear weapon, but the president’s approach wasn’t the best way to prevent that.
